page.title: 15Pocket Money
page.content:
I have carried out a survey in our class on how much boys get for thjeir pocket money. The overall amount of money that boys get in our class is Â£46.O5. The average amount is Â£l.92. Ten boys get over the average amount and l4 get under the average amount. Most boys get about Â£l.OO per week.
Amount of pocket money:
<99p Â£l-l.99 Â£2-Â£2.99 Â£3.OO
NO. 7 8 4 5
Some boys may get more money than they are supposed to. By doing jobs for their parents, like going to the shops, cutting the grass or tidying their bedrooms, they can earn more money. Kenneth McConaghy
